00031 
00032 #include "lbann/lbann_base.hpp"
00033 #include "lbann/layers/lbann_layer.hpp"
00034 
00035 namespace lbann {
00036 
00042 class regularizer {
00043 public:
00049   virtual void fp_connections() {}
00051   virtual void bp_connections() {}
00058   virtual void fp_weights() {}
00060   virtual void bp_weights() {}
00066   virtual void fp_activations() {}
00068   virtual void bp_activations() {}
00069 
00071   virtual void setup(Layer* l) { m_layer = l; }
00072 protected:
00074   Layer* m_layer;
00075 };
